original: Nādabindūpaniṣat oṃ
akāro dakṣiṇaḥ pakṣa ukāras tūttaraḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: akāraḥ dakṣiṇaḥ pakṣaḥ ukāraḥ tu uttaraḥ smṛtaḥ

original: makāras tasya pucchaṃ vā ardhamātrā śiras tathā // NbiUp_1 //
analyzed: makāraḥ tasya puccham vai ardha mātrā śiraḥ tathā

original: pādau rajas tamas tasya śarīraṃ sattvam ucyate /
analyzed: pādau rajaḥ tamaḥ tasya śarīram sattvam ucyate

original: dharmaś ca dakṣiṇaṃ cakṣur adharmaś cottaraṃ smṛtam // NbiUp_2 //
analyzed: dharmaḥ ca dakṣiṇam cakṣuḥ adharmaḥ ca uttaram smṛtam

original: bhūr lokaḥ pādayos tasya bhuvar lokas tu jānunoḥ /
analyzed: bhūḥ lokaḥ pādayoḥ tasya bhuvar lokaḥ tu jānunoḥ

original: svar lokaḥ kaṭideśe tu nābhideśe mahar jagat // NbiUp_3 //
analyzed: svar lokaḥ kaṭi deśe tu nābhi deśe mahar jagat

original: janalokas tu hṛdaye kaṇṭhadeśe tapas tataḥ /
analyzed: janalokaḥ tu hṛdaye kaṇṭha deśe tapaḥ tatas

original: bhruvor lalāṭamadhye tu satyaloko vyavasthitaḥ // NbiUp_4 //
analyzed: bhruvoḥ lalāṭa madhye tu satyalokaḥ vyavasthitaḥ

original: sahasram iti cātra mantra eva pradarśitaḥ /
analyzed: sahasram iti ca atra mantraḥ eva pradarśitaḥ

original: evam enaṃ samārūḍho haṃsaṃ yogavicakṣaṇaḥ // NbiUp_5 //
analyzed: evam enam samārūḍhaḥ haṃsam yoga vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: na badhyate karmacārī pāpakoṭiśatair api /
analyzed: na badhyate karma cārī pāpa koṭi śataiḥ api

original: āgneyī prathamā mātrā vāyavyaiṣā vaśānugā // NbiUp_6 //
analyzed: āgneyī prathamā mātrā vāyavyā eṣā vaśa anugā

original: bhānumaṇḍalasaṃkāśā bhaven mātrā tathottarā /
analyzed: bhānu maṇḍala saṃkāśā bhavet mātrā tathā uttarā

original: paramā cārdhamātrā ca vāruṇīṃ tāṃ vidur budhāḥ // NbiUp_7 //
analyzed: paramā ca ardha mātrā ca vāruṇīm tām viduḥ budhāḥ

original: kalātrayānanā vāpi tāsāṃ mātrāpratiṣṭhitā /
analyzed: kalā traya ānanā vā api tāsām mātrā pratiṣṭhitā

original: eṣa oṃkāra ākhyāto dhāraṇābhir nibodhata // NbiUp_8 //
analyzed: eṣaḥ oṃkāraḥ ākhyātaḥ dhāraṇābhiḥ nibodhata

original: yoṣiṇī prathamā mātrā vidyunmālā tathāparā /
analyzed: prathamā mātrā vidyunmālā tathā aparā

original: pataṃgī ca tṛtīyā syāc caturthī vāyuveginī // NbiUp_9 //
analyzed: pataṃgī ca tṛtīyā syāt caturthī vāyuveginī

original: pañcamīnām adheyā ca ṣaṣṭhī caindrī vidhīyate /
analyzed: pañcamīnām adheyā ca ṣaṣṭhī ca aindrī vidhīyate

original: saptamī vaiṣṇavī nāma śaṃkarī ca tathāṣṭamī // NbiUp_10 //
analyzed: saptamī vaiṣṇavī nāma śaṃkarī ca tathā aṣṭamī

original: navamī mahatī nāma dhruveti daśamī matā /
analyzed: navamī mahatī nāma dhruvā iti daśamī matā

original: ekādaśī bhaven maunī brāhmīti dvādaśī matā // NbiUp_11 //
analyzed: ekādaśī bhavet maunī brāhmī iti dvādaśī matā

original: prathamāyāṃ tu mātrāyāṃ yadi prāṇair viyujyate /
analyzed: prathamāyām tu mātrāyām yadi prāṇaiḥ viyujyate

original: sa rājā bhārate varṣe sārvabhaumaḥ prajāyate // NbiUp_12 //
analyzed: sa rājā bhārate varṣe sārvabhaumaḥ prajāyate

original: dvitīyāyāṃ samutkrānto bhaved yakṣo mahātmavān /
analyzed: dvitīyāyām samutkrāntaḥ bhavet yakṣaḥ mahā ātmavān

original: vidyādharas tṛtīyāyāṃ gandharvas tu caturthikām // NbiUp_13 //
analyzed: vidyādharaḥ tṛtīyāyām gandharvaḥ tu caturthikām

original: pañcamyām atha mātrāyāṃ yadi prāṇair viyujyate /
analyzed: pañcamyām atha mātrāyām yadi prāṇaiḥ viyujyate

original: uṣitaḥ sahadevatvaṃ somaloke mahīyate // NbiUp_14 //
analyzed: uṣitaḥ saha deva tvam soma loke mahīyate

original: ṣaṣṭhyām indrasya sāyujyaṃ saptamyāṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ padam /
analyzed: ṣaṣṭhyām indrasya sāyujyam saptamyām vaiṣṇavam padam

original: aṣṭamyāṃ vrajate rudraṃ paśūnāṃ ca patiṃ tathā // NbiUp_15 //
analyzed: aṣṭamyām vrajate rudram paśūnām ca patim tathā

original: navamyāṃ ca maharlokaṃ daśamyāṃ ca dhruvaṃ vrajet /
analyzed: navamyām ca mahar lokam daśamyām ca dhruvam vrajet

original: ekādaśyāṃ tapolokaṃ dvādaśyāṃ brahma śāśvatam // NbiUp_16 //
analyzed: ekādaśyām tapolokam dvādaśyām brahma śāśvatam

original: tataḥ paraṃ śuddhaṃ vyāpakaṃ niṣkalaṃ śivam /
analyzed: tatas param śuddham vyāpakam niṣkalam śivam

original: sadoditaṃ paraṃ brahma jyotiṣām udayo yataḥ // NbiUp_17 //
analyzed: sadā uditam param brahma jyotiṣām udayaḥ yatas

original: atīndriyaṃ guṇātītaṃ mano līnaṃ yadā bhavet /
analyzed: atīndriyam guṇa atītam manaḥ līnam yadā bhavet

original: anaupamyam abhāvaṃ ca yogayuktaṃ tadādiśet // NbiUp_18 //
analyzed: anaupamyam abhāvam ca yoga yuktam tadā ādiśet

original: tadbhaktas tatsamāsaktaḥ śanair muñcet kalevaram /
analyzed: tad bhaktaḥ tad samāsaktaḥ śanais muñcet kalevaram

original: susthito yogacāreṇa sarvasaṅgavivarjitaḥ // NbiUp_19 //
analyzed: susthitaḥ yoga cāreṇa sarva saṅga vivarjitaḥ

original: tato vilīnapāśo 'sau vimalaḥ kevalaḥ prabhuḥ /
analyzed: tatas sau vimalaḥ kevalaḥ prabhuḥ

original: tenaiva brahmabhāvena paramānandam aśnute // NbiUp_20 //
analyzed: tena eva brahma bhāvena parama ānandam aśnute
